Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.app

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.app.Keys
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.app.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Keys
GameController class. GameController has access to chaps challenge, and so has commands which can interact with the state of the game, such as saving, loading, pausing/unpausing and exiting the game

    GameController(ChapsChallenge c)
    Initialises a new controller for the Chaps Challenge Game.
